Articles.Content:
Here's how it works...

Player 1: What if I added 16 more SRBs to my rocket?

Player 2: Jeb would be 16 times happier. What if there were multiple Jebs?

Player 3: The first one would be the only one recognized as Jeb. The rest would be called fakes by the community. What if...(etc.)

NOTE: Do not stay on KSP with your "what if's". Please have different topics as well.

I'll start.

What if all our avatars were this picture:
We would die. What if there was no more mud in the world?
We would no longer need carpet cleaners. What if the moon is really made of cheese.

World hunger would end.

What if our avatars were THIS picture: (By the way, I find these in random* google searches.)

*searching for "rubber boots stuck in mud"

Edited July 28, 2014 by Sun

I would change it.

What if all the hatred in the world was ended?

Life would be boring. Or happy. It could go either way.

What if our avatars were LOCKED as this gif:

-snip-

What if the kraken was angry?

Edited July 28, 2014 by KasperVld

We would die.

What if our avatars were LOCKED as this gif, and the internet doesn't allow you to make a new forum or go to an alternate one. TRAPPING you in the current KSP forums. You can still go around the rest of the internet freely, but this is the ONE and ONLY ksp forum that you can access. Under those conditions, what would you do if our avatars were locked as this gif:

.

I'd use the forums less often. ;-)

What if the world was ruled by women?

It would be a lot more peaceful, that's for sure.

What if everyone decided to use this image as their avatar (and liked it)?

Ok... This is getting ridiculous...

I would kill myself.

Happy now?

What if Sun would come up with another idea for his posts?

This thread would be getting somewhere.

What if our solar system was the only one in the galaxy?

We would be a rouge star hurdling towards Andromeda, (The Milky Way is heading for Andromeda so since the Sun would be the Milky Way we would be captured by Andromeda)

What If you could render stuph further than 2km in KSP

SRB recovery with parachutes would be possible.

What if everyone colonized Laythe and dried up its oceans and overpolluted its atmosphere?

We melt Vall and move there.

What if Scott Manley stopped playing KSP?

God would kill a lot of kittens.

What if 4chan decided that KSP was the cancer of the Internet?

Edited July 28, 2014 by mrrpamplemousse

Than I would decide that 4chan is the cancer of KSP.

What if only women ran NASA?

Maybe we would be on Mars by now.

What if all of the moons of Jool collided into each other, and released a gigantic pulse of radiation through the solar system?

Then all kerbals will either die, or colonize.

What if the Angry Video Game Nerd and the Nostalgia Critic were still (fake) enemies?

I have no idea who either of those are.

What would you do if you were in this situation?:

I don't know. I'm starting to get worried, I mean, why would someone post so many of that gif?

What if this thread never existed!?

You wouldn't have been able to say that.

What if you were in this situation?(be serious now.):

I'd go swim in a less muddy water.

What if there's was a war between Chuck Norris and Bruce Lee?

Edited July 28, 2014 by mrrpamplemousse

Everyone DIES.

What if there was /ksp/ on 4chan?

Nothing would be much different... Maybe we would be a little more blunt to eachother, have a team in the 4Chan Summer&Winter Cup or something in the like.

Not all 4Chan board are completely idiotic and retarded, /tg/ is a good example.

What if /b/ took over the world with the help of /pol/?
